name: job-search-api
description: API serverless para búsqueda de ofertas de empleo con demo React

scripts.copy-widget: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='widget';const dest='build/widget';if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>{if(file.endsWith('.js')||file.endsWith('.css'))fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,file),path.join(dest,file));});console.log('✅ Widget files copied');"
